title: My boy ivern sitting at that legendary sub 1% pick rate
body:
It hurts to see ones main in such a state. {{sticker:zombie-nunu-bummed}} 


Before you say it hes sitting on a 46% win rate so it isnt just that he is a niche hero either.

But if no one is picking him, that means he is always open for you.

he can pop off.  the avg player pool is so garbage you can't carry people too dumb to be in shield range. get someone fed and they think they're the one winning like a champ vs an assassin meta and just suicide relentlessly throwing a game 4v5
I think his concept as a champion is making him unbalanceable. As he is either to weak or so overbearing that you need to permaban him.
This is said literally about so many champs. There is a way to balance every champion there is no such thing as making them so overpowered or so useless with tweaks they can be done correctly.

Not that I don't think Ivern could use a little bit higher playrate.. But keep in mind that there's somewhere around 140 champions in the game.  A BALANCED playrate is less than 1% :){{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}

I play him from time to time, he doesn't seem that bad but he could get some love (just dont buff him to the point hes either perma banned/picked and then riot nerfs him again)
Btw Ivern being meta isnt so good because one of the op parts of ivern is being unpredictable, if he becomes meta people will learn how to play against him predicting his paths
I love Ivern so much hes so different than all the characters I love how cheerful he is compared to most champions being kinda edgy or really edgy

As ivern m7, I'd like more damage on the W AA.
And above all, improvements in Daisy's A.I.
LOL I forgot this champion exists, can't remember when I saw him.
